name: 'Life on Mars' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which person from Senior Staff showed Joe around?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	CJ wanted Joe to take care of the life on Mars situation because he was new to the Counsel's office.

questions.text: What movie star did Donna refer to herself as?
questions.explanation:
Hedren & Tippi Hedren.

	Donna told Joe Quincy and CJ this because Tippi Hedren played the lead role in 'The Birds'.

questions.text: Toby invite Charlie to eat lunch with him in his office.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Toby invited Charlie to eat with him because Charlie told Toby he would never know he was there, however, Charlie talked the entire time they were eating.

questions.text: Who did Charlie say should have written a book about her job?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Willy

	Charlie was reading an article in the 'Washington Post' about a woman who was writing a tell-all book and told Toby that Mrs. Willy should write one because she cleans and winds clocks in the White House just like her ancestors.

questions.text: Did Joe ask the Vice President if he was having an affair?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After Josh asked the Vice President that, Hoynes said, "I should hit you in the face."

December.

	CJ was talking to the press gaggle and wished Mark a Happy Birthday only she got the wrong month.

questions.text: Who did Josh and Donna yell, "Stop it!", to?
questions.explanation:
Bird.

	The bird was outside Josh's office window pecking and then later it sat outside CJ's office window.

questions.text: When was the Vice President's resignation to take place?
questions.explanation:
6 A.M.

	The time the resignation was to take effect was written in the letter.

questions.text: Who delivered the Vice President's resignation?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	The episode started with Claire meeting Charlie at the White House entrance.

questions.text: Who said, "I don't practice law? I help write the laws. I write the laws. I make the laws. I am the law."
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	When Donna told Josh he wasn't really a lawyer, Josh made this statement proudly to Joe and Donna.
